The last visit 1 year surgery . You may eligible 50 old , soon undergo knee replacement surgery , serious heart condition certain medical condition , take certain type medication . The study include evaluation people ' pain , physical functioning , medication use , physiological response sensory stimuli heat cold . The research take place Brigham & Women 's Pain Management Center , 850 Boylston St , Chestnut Hill . For information , please contact George ( gmensing @ partners.org , 617-732-9463 ) .
